title: IK Multimedia Amplitube Metal
description:
AmpliTube Metal 
A metal distortion powerhouse software/plug-in

AmpliTube Metal is the first guitar amp and effects modeling software focused entirely on metal sounds. Instructions:

1. Run Setup.exe
2. Follow Instructions
3. Open your favorite DAW
4. Run Keygen.exe 
5. Sweat nothing because there isn't a virus (Scanned with AVG, PC Tools, Symantic)
6. Select Amplitube Metal from the dropdown box 
7. Enjoy
